Story: Hello, my name is Ivan Vasilev. I live and work by the mantra "Never stop learning..." I’ve always been good at math and science that’s why I graduated as a mechanical engineer. After many years working in the logistics, I decided to learn web development. I find great interest in all new digital technologies and latest design practices. So I came into the world of WEB. Relatively quickly I learned the basics, because I think logically and I understand the technical part of the projects. I developed some projects and continue to improve them. I also made without a budget their SEO-optimization.
Story1: When I am not working, I spend as much time I can with my wife and my son, who motivate me to do my best.
Story2: I would love to participate in larger projects, to work in a team of developers where I would be able to enlarge my current skills and knowledge and learn new technologies. Currently I am looking for a full time job, but I would be glad also to join freelance projects.
Story3: If you find my portfolio, experience and my projects interesting, please contact me.
